original_title: Nowa Polska Nr. 1 - Młodzież na uniwersytetach
overview: The first episode of the "Nowa Polska" reportage series focused on the reconstruction of the homeland after the Second World War. This episode is entitled "Młodzież na uniwersytetach". On March 19, 1945, the first post-war academic year began at the Jagiellonian University.
title: New Poland No. 1 - Youth at the Universities
